And he caught the bear, took it in his arms, lifted it from the ground, and began dancing round the room with it. 
PRINCE Vxsiii kept the promise he had given to Princess Drubetskaya who had spoken to him on behalf of her only son Boris on the evening of Anna Pdvlovna's soiree. The mat- ter was mentioned to the Emperor, an excep- tion made, and Boris transferred into the regi- ment of Semenov Guards with the rank of cor-
